name: vue-country-intl
description: A vue-based mobile phone area code selection, nationality selection component（一个基于vue的手机区号选择、国籍选择组件）

scripts.serve-windows:20: set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run generate-version && vue-cli-service serve
scripts.serve-mac:20: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run generate-version && vue-cli-service serve
scripts.build-windows:20: set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run generate-version && vue-cli-service build
scripts.build-mac:20: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run generate-version && vue-cli-service build
scripts.build:countryIntl-windows:20: set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run generate-version && webpack --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.build:countryIntl-mac:20: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run generate-version && webpack --config webpack.prod.js
scripts.build:countryFlag-windows:20: set NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run generate-version && webpack --config webpack.build-country-flag.prod.js
scripts.build:countryFlag-mac:20: export NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider && npm run generate-version && webpack --config webpack.build-country-flag.prod.js

author: hearth_learning_money
